body_html: Yeah, I agree that this would be useful, but it's probably unlikely to be added (added Mustafa to comment). There's an upcoming API that won't recreate the session and graph that will be more useful for this use-case.
body_text: Yeah, I agree that this would be useful, but it's probably unlikely to be added (added Mustafa to comment). There's an upcoming API that won't recreate the session and graph that will be more useful for this use-case.
body: Yeah, I agree that this would be useful, but it's probably unlikely to be added (added Mustafa to comment). There's an upcoming API that won't recreate the session and graph that will be more useful for this use-case.
